name: Sound Wave Battle
description:
When you want to rest, but the neighbor said no. 
So you battle with them with your beloved radio.
Creating lethal sound wave. How to Play

1. WASD - Move

2. Speak on Microphone to shoot bullet or choose a song to replace microphone input.

Created by 

1. Finiko Kasula Novenda (Programmer)

2. Kevin Erdiza Yogatama (Programmer)

3. Kukuh Basuki Rahmat (Programmer)
